QuestData.Title: Light Within the Darkness
QuestData.Description: <Crusader Bridenbrad's tabard rests in the bottom of the chest, shifting slightly as the howling wind finds its way in.>$B$BTirion will desire this last remnant of the great crusader.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Crusader Bridenbrad's Tabard to Highlord Tirion Fordring at Crusaders' Pinnacle.
QuestData.CompletionText: He has departed, hasn't he? I felt a small bit of light leave the land.
QuestData.RewardText: I am glad you were able to save him from undeath. With A'dal's blessing, he will know no evil in his afterlife.$B$BWe shall take heart in his shining example and in your selflessness. Thank you for all that you have done.
